sponsors.name: CVCORP
sponsors.details: CVCORP is a Hyderabad-based professional training and coaching initiative focused on improving employability through targeted training, career guidance, HR services, and recruitment support.

sponsors.name: Edu Connect India
sponsors.details: Edu Connect India helps bridge the information gap in education by giving students and parents up-to-date institute information, while helping institutions reach and engage prospective applicants.

sponsors.name: Smart Interviews
sponsors.details: Smart Interviews is an ed-tech platform that bridges academia and industry by training students in coding and DSA with industry-vetted curriculum to improve hiring outcomes at top tech companies.
